Our project aims to gamify NFTs and have user decisions make an impact in the real world. Backed by Cardano's ethos, this project's vision will be congruent with its foundation - to build a flourishing community that truly cares for sustainability and the environment.

We want to re-distribute the flow of funds to directly aid underexposed projects that are tackling global issues and together with the community, make a difference in the world.
